column4: hello, Ubuntu channel. I was wondering how to add a link to my second hard drive(with windows 98SE) to my Ubuntu desktop. I found something about it online but it was for NTFS file systems, I have windows 98SE and FAT32. I heard that ubuntu should automatically put a link on your desktop, but mine didn't.
in theory you could mount it to the Desktop
does it already mount on startup or does it not mount at all?
